articles.title: Christian Horner meets Max Verstappen's agent for face-to-face talks amid rising tensions at Red Bull - Sky Sports
articles.description: Christian Horner staged a face-to-face meeting with Max Verstappen's representative in Dubai on Monday in a bid to iron out rising tensions at Red Bull.
articles.content:
Christian Horner staged a face-to-face meeting with Max Verstappen's representative in Dubai on Monday in a bid to iron out rising tensions at Red Bull.

articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Alpine announces F1 technical restructuring after key exits - Motorsport.com
articles.description: The Alpine Formula 1 team has announced a technical restructuring as a result of the impending departures of two key figures and the poor form of the new A524.
articles.content: It emerged over the Bahrain GP weekend that technical director Matt Harman and head of aerodynamics Dirk de Beer had tendered their resignations, although the former was still present on the pitwall … [+2055 chars]
